lexUnit.name: pinch.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an amount of an ingredient that can be held between fingers and thumb.

sentence.text: He had always put two pinches of it on his food , had n't he ? thought Susan but she was n't sure and Michael was talking again .
Nevertheless , it has taken more than just a pinch of the new S-class 's style with its first real attempt at a grille , cut down into the front bumper .

pinch of dried mixed herbs
